query:
ALTER TABLE assessments 
ADD COLUMN componentName VARCHAR(255) NULL,
ADD COLUMN componentLocation VARCHAR(500) NULL,
ADD COLUMN sectionId INT NULL,
ADD COLUMN `condition` VARCHAR(50) NULL,
ADD COLUMN conditionPercentage VARCHAR(10) NULL,
ADD COLUMN observations TEXT NULL,
ADD COLUMN recommendations TEXT NULL,
ADD COLUMN remainingUsefulLife INT NULL,
ADD COLUMN expectedUsefulLife INT NULL,
ADD COLUMN reviewYear INT NULL,
ADD COLUMN lastTimeAction INT NULL,
ADD COLUMN replacementValue INT NULL,
ADD COLUMN actionYear INT NULL,
ADD COLUMN assessedAt TIMESTAMP NULL;
